text: More Than Ever is the third studio album by American hip hop artist Sims, a member of Minneapolis hip hop collective Doomtree. It was released on Doomtree Records on November 4, 2016. == Music == The album is produced by Icetep of Minneapolis hip hop group Killstreak and Doomtree producers Paper Tiger and Lazerbeak. == Track listing == == Personnel == Adapted from the album's Bandcamp page. * Joe Mabbott – mixing * Bruce Templeton – mastering * Lazerbeak – executive producer * Andy Lund – artwork == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" !scope="col"| Chart !scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"| US Heatseekers Albums (Billboard) | 18 |- !scope="row"| US Independent Albums (Billboard) | 48 |- !scope="row"| US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) | 34 |- !scope="row"| US Rap Albums (Billboard) | 21 |- |} == References == == External links == * * More Than Ever at Bandcamp Category:2016 albums Category:Sims (rapper) albums Category:Doomtree Records albums Category:Albums produced by Lazerbeak
title: More Than Ever (Sims album)
